mosfetChannelType.description: doping of a transistor's channel - describes whether a transistor is n-type or p-type

transistorCount.description: number of transistors in the package

vgs.description: gate to source voltage difference of a MOSFET

vgsMax.description: maximum gate to source voltage difference that can be continuously applied to a MOSFET. This is a limiting value

vds.description: drain to source voltage difference of a MOSFET

vdsMax.description: maximum drain to source voltage difference that can be continuously applied to a MOSFET. This is a limiting value

vdsVbr.description: drain to source breakdown voltage of a MOSFET

vgsTh.description: gate to source voltage difference required to produce a conducting path between drain and source

vsdDiodeVf.description: reverse diode forward voltage when a MOSFET is in off-state

iDrain.description: maximum continuous DC current that can flow through a MOSFET channel.This is a limiting value

idPulsed.description: maximum pulsed DC current that can flow through a MOSFET channel.This is a limiting value

iDss.description: drain-source leakage current of a MOSFET when the gate to source voltage difference is zero

iGss.description: gate-source leakage current of a MOSFET when the drain to source voltage difference is zero

diodeContinuousCurrent.description: maximum continuous forward current of the body diode of a MOSFET (IS).This is a limiting value

diodePulsedCurrent.description: maximum pulsed forward current of the body diode of a MOSFET. This is a limiting value

forwardTransconductance.description: signal gain, change in drain current with variation of gate-source voltage of a MOSFET (gFS)

rg.description: internal gate resistance of a MOSFET

crss.description: reverse transfer capacitance of a MOSFET

qg.description: total gate charge of a MOSFET
qg.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qgd.description: gate to drain charge of a MOSFET
qgd.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qgs.description: gate to source charge of a MOSFET
qgs.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage and drain current

qrr.description: reverse recovery charge of the body diode of a MOSFET

idVsVds.description: graph of drain current (iD) as a function of drain source voltage (vds)

idVsVgs.description: graph of drain current (iD) as a function of gate source voltage (vgs)

tdON.description: turn-on delay time of a MOSFET
tdON.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

tdOFF.description: turn-off delay time of a MOSFET
tdOFF.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

riseTime.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

fallTime.$comment: conditions include drain-source voltage (Vds), gate-source voltage (Vgs), load value.

trr.description: reverse recovery time of the body diode of a MOSFET
trr.$comment: conditions include body diode forward current value and ramp rate.

pTot.description: maximum power dissipation of a MOSFET

pdVsTemp.description: graph of power dissipation vs temperature
